title: Web Referrer

meta:enum.internal: Referral originated from the current domain or site.
meta:enum.external: Referral originated from a different domain or site that was not a search or social type.
meta:enum.search_engine: Search engine referrers are identified when visitors use a search engine to access the site.
meta:enum.typed_bookmarked: Typed/bookmarked referrers are identified when visitors type your siteâ€™s URL directly into their browser, or if they access the site by selecting bookmarks.
meta:enum.email: A referring domain is considered as an email referring domain type when visitors click an emailed message link containing the protocol imap:// or mail:// and arrive at the site.
meta:enum.social: The referrer is identified as a social network.
meta:enum.unknown: The referrer is unidentifiable (unknown). `No JavaScript` could be the cause.
meta:enum.news: The URL of a referrer started with news://. As such, the referrer link was posted on a Usenet newsgroup rather than a web page.
